title: GCN Schema for Fermi GBM Notices
description: This schema is for the following Fermi GBM notices: alert, flight position, ground position, final position and subthreshold.

ground_generated_notice.description: Some notices, designed to be generated in flight, can be issued on the ground.

human_in_the_loop.description: True when a human had input or confirmed before further processing. False when the notice was generated entirely automatically. Sometimes abbreviated as "HITL".

in_lat_fov.description: The event was localizad in the LAT field of view.

light_curve_url.description: URL of the quicklook light curve plot

localization_energy_range.description: Not to be confused with the trigger energy range.

notice_type.description: This is the notice title from the text format.  The enum also corresponds to packet types 110, 111, 112, 115 and 131 from the classic binary format.

reliability.description: Reliability of the subthreshold search result.

trigger_algorithm_number.description: The instrument flight software algorithm that triggered on this event, dependent on timescale, energy, and significance as described in A. von Kienlin et al 2020 ApJ 893 46.
